Landing.title: ¡¡Take advantage of the monthly offers!!
Landing.description: In Nova Tech don't miss our monthly offers! Every month, we offer an incredible 50% discount on a wide selection of products. Every month we select 8 different products for this great offer.

Store.sectionOneTitle: Everything you need to live comfortably
Store.sectionOneDescOne: We offer appliances with sleek, modern designs that add a sophisticated look to your home or business.
Store.sectionOneDescTwo: We offer the best brands that guarantee the necessary quality and reliability.
Store.sectionOneDescTree: We have a wide selection of state-of-the-art appliances to meet all your needs.
Store.panIconone: You can pay by card, debit, cash or up to 12 installments without a card, always at the best price
Store.panIcontwo: Just for being registered in Nova Tech you can have free shipping on thousands of products.
Store.panIcontree: ¿You do not like? Give it back! At Nova Tech, there's nothing you can't do, because you're always protected.
Store.panelEndOneone: The best selection of products online.
Store.panelEndOnetwo: Shop from the comfort of your home.
Store.panelEndOnetree: Find everything you need in one place.
Store.panelEndOnefor: Quality and confidence in each purchase.
Store.panelEndTwoone: Competitive prices on all our products.
Store.panelEndTwotwo: !Do not wait any longer to have what you need!
Store.panelEndTwofor: Choose from a wide variety of products.
Store.panelEndTwofive: Make your purchases online safely and with peace of mind.
Store.panelEndTreetwo: All the brands you love in one place.
Store.panelEndTreetree: Buy now and pay later with our deferred payment option.
Store.panelEndTreefor: High quality products at low prices.
Store.panelEndTreefive: More than 10 years of experience in e-commerce.

Aboutus.title: About us
Aboutus.parrafo: Welcome to our appliance store! We are a company passionate about technology and committed to providing our customers with the best shopping experience. In our extensive catalog you will find a variety of brands and models, all carefully selected to ensure offer you the best quality and performance. We focus not only on offering you high-quality products, but also a unique and satisfying shopping experience. We invite you to visit us and discover everything we have to offer. We are waiting for you with open arms! !
Aboutus.Leo: Age: 22 years old Student: Web Development (Rolling Code) Information systems engineering student, reason that motivated me to do code school. And now my biggest hobby is programming because it's something I like. I have programming bases thanks to the engineering degree
Aboutus.Ivan: Age: 27 Years Student: Web Development (rolling Code) Starting my path as a developer. My goal is to specialize and get to know development tools in depth to be able to create complex structures in a deep and professional way
Aboutus.Matias: Age: 27 Years Student: Web Development (Rolling Code). I am a student of Engineering and RollingCode to broaden my knowledge of programming languages
Aboutus.Carlos: Age: 34 Years Student: Web Development (rolling Code) Currently working in private security, I have not defined what to do at the end of the course, but with great expectations of changing my future.
